doc:
Don Marion Davis https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Don_Marion_Davis 0 Don Marion Davis (born October 9, 1917), professionally known as Don Marion and also credited as John Henry, Jr. is an American former child actor, who appeared in several feature films and comedy shorts during the Hollywood silent film era. Don_Marion_Davis ( born October_9_,_1917 ) , professionally_known as Don_Marion and also credited as John_Henry , Jr. is an_American_former_child_actor , who appeared in several_feature_films and comedy_shorts during the_Hollywood_silent_film_era .
